content.raw: If we weren't on such a tight deadline, I would say that the API changes to GuiEvents, MainWindow, RenderWidget etc. should all go in separate pull requests to Gazebo so that they could get reviewed and tested separately... maybe we can diff the haptix branch with default later and separate them out before releasing.
content.html: If we weren't on such a tight deadline, I would say that the API changes to GuiEvents, MainWindow, RenderWidget etc. should all go in separate pull requests to Gazebo so that they could get reviewed and tested separately... maybe we can diff the haptix branch with default later and separate them out before releasing.
